description: The animation-timeline, scroll-timeline, and view-timeline CSS properties advance animations based on the user's scroll position.
description_html: The animation-timeline, scroll-timeline, and view-timeline CSS properties advance animations based on the user's scroll position.
name: Scroll-driven animations

notes: Zero scroll range is treated as 100% but should be 0% (see bug 1780865).
Supports the deprecated horizontal and vertical axis values, and not the x and y values.

chrome.notes: Support is currently reset-only. Including animation resets a previously-declared animation-timeline value to auto, but animation-timeline cannot be set via animation.

chrome_android.notes: Support is currently reset-only. Including animation resets a previously-declared animation-timeline value to auto, but animation-timeline cannot be set via animation.

notes: The syntax of the shorthand property uses the fixed order of name and then the axis.
Supports the deprecated horizontal and vertical axis values, and not the x and y values.
The @scroll-timeline at-rule is replaced with the longhand properties scroll-timeline-name and scroll-timeline-axis and the shorthand property scroll-timeline.
The syntax of the shorthand property uses the fixed order of name and then the axis.
Supports the deprecated horizontal and vertical values, and not the x and y values.
The @scroll-timeline at-rule is replaced with the longhand properties scroll-timeline-name and scroll-timeline-axis and the shorthand property scroll-timeline.
The syntax of the shorthand property uses the fixed order of name and then the axis.
The @scroll-timeline at-rule is replaced with the longhand properties scroll-timeline-name and scroll-timeline-axis and the shorthand property scroll-timeline.

firefox.notes: Now supports the x and y values, and also the deprecated horizontal and vertical values.
Now supports the x and y values, and also the deprecated horizontal and vertical values.
